summary: Rename the `Temporal` module to `Temporalio` in the Ruby SDK to maintain consistency with naming conventions used in other Temporal SDKs.
userImpact: Users will need to update imports and references from `Temporal` to `Temporalio` to maintain consistency with other SDKs.
proposedFix: Rename the `Temporal` module to `Temporalio` throughout the Ruby SDK codebase.
resolutionDetails: The module was renamed from `Temporal` to `Temporalio` to align with naming conventions across other Temporal SDKs.
